name: Good Boy (Corsam)
description:
Good Boy is a game where you play a dog that helps ghosts find item they lost. Use your smell and follow your instinct to make the world a better place.

The game was made during a game jam at ISART Digital Paris by a 9 people team.

The jam theme was "Make the world a better place", and Good Boy was awarded 2 prices, the "Degree of Finish" and "Technical Challenge" prices.

It's recommended to play with a controller.

Controls
  • Walk : Left Stick (keyboard : WASD)
  • Bark / Select : A (keyboard : E)
  • Sniff / Crouch : Y (keyboard : Space)
  • Grab : X (keyboard : F)
  • Pause : Start (keyboard : Escape)
Credits
  • Vinh-An BUIS - Music & Soud Design
  • Laetitia CHERUAU - Game Art
  • Antoine COSTE - Game Art
  • Liéna EULOGE - Game Programming
  • Duncan FORTUNA - Game Programming
  • Thibaut PANCHOUT - Game Design
  • Julie PEREZ - Game Art
  • Gladys PLAT - Game Art
  • Corentin SAMANIEGO - Game Design
